"Fight in My Place":
"This Client Order has been discontinued.
It cannot be reported to the client,
regardless of whether or not you have
achieved its requirement(s).
Please cancel the Client Order.





I've heard reports of Darkers
massing on each planet.
I'd like to go and fight them myself...
Unfortunately, I'm prohibited from
going on missions while I'm here.
I'm sorry, but I have to ask you to
subdue the Darkers.
Will you do it?

※Lv.1+ enemies"
